Class Boss

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.Boss
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Boss extends FighterPlane
Represents the boss enemy in the game. The boss has a unique move pattern and fires projectiles at a higher rate than other enemies. The boss also has a shield that can be activated for a limited time.

  • Property Summary
